event.title: INTERNATIONAL OUTDOOR DINNER PARTY IN TSURUMIRYOKUCHI OSAKA.
event.catch: 日韓中HAPPY　世界中にお友達を作ろう～♪
event.description:
We are introducing international Outdoor Dinner party.
Welcome to Japan!

Are you….

☆ Looking for Japanese Friends?

☆ New to Osaka?

☆ Wish to find nice people?

☆ Studying Japanese language and would like to find language exchange partner?

☆ Spend wonderful time?

If your anwer is YES! You are more than welcomed.

■ See Japanese beautiful landscape
■ Eat Japanese traditional Cuisine
■ Meet Japanese people

We will be serving you luxurious food, for example,

“Eat & enjoy Japanese traditional Cuisine”

■　Grilled Crab,
■　Matsutake Mushroom cooked rice,
■　Matsutake mushroom clear soup.
■　Kyoho(Japanese Grape,)Nashi（Japanese pare） Kaki(Japanese fruit) and Yakiimo (baked sweet potato) Mikan (Mandarin) and many more.

All foreigners have entitled to get discount rate.

Notece!
We will cook together, so that even shy person will be able to get socialized more comfortably and easily. And what’s more, Kids are FREE of charge.

High schoolers, Jr. High schoolers also FREE of charge.

YOUNGEST INTERNATIONAL OUTDOOR DINNER.

We are mostly in our 10’s to 20’s something.

See the detail for our website.

http://inexs.jp/
event.address: 大阪市鶴見区　鶴見緑地公園内　バーベキュー場
event.owner_nickname: INEXS　大阪で国際、異文化、語学交流
